article_title: Obamacare to cover majority of transgender woman's sex reassignment surgery costs
article_text: One man is dead, and authorities are looking for a person of interest after a shooting overnight in Anderson, deputies said.

og.description: Lisa Larson is preparing to have transsexual sex reassignment surgery in 2015 and says Obamacare is covering a majority of the cost. Courtesy: WMBF
